top.title: UPS and FedEx ground some cargo planes after Kentucky air disaster
top.summary: The delivery companies confirm MD-11 planes have been temporarily grounded as the death toll in Louisville rises to 14.

top.title: Trump gives Hungary one-year exemption from Russian energy sanctions
top.summary: The opt-out comes despite the US increasing pressure on allies to sever economic ties with Russia.

top.title: DNA pioneer James Watson dies at 97
top.summary: Watson co-discover the double-helix structure of DNA, but his reputation was later damaged by his comments on race and sex.

top.title: Elon Musk's $1tn pay deal approved by Tesla shareholders
top.summary: The richest man in the world will get hundreds of millions of new shares if he hits his targets.

top.title: Why human-shaped robots loom large in Musk's Tesla plans
top.summary: The tech billionaire believes Optimus could play a big role in the lives of people around the world.

top.title: What does Elon Musk do with all his money?
top.summary: While he has a penchant for cars and jets, the world's richest person reportedly lives a relatively modest life.

title.#text: The endearing movie that affirms creativity as a human act
